overview: A love letter to Toronto, Chesterfield tells an important story of perseverance and personal growth through an experience many people can relate to - moving a couch. Chesterfield is about finding home in an unfamiliar place, being open minded, and appreciating the friendships we make along the way.
tagline: After his friend leaves him stranded with a couch he bought online, Lewis is forced to drag it home across the entire city.
title: Chesterfield
